name: Pet Days
description:
Pet Days is a rogue like pet simulator,

there's plenty of different kinds of pets and different kinds of fruits!

All you need to know is how to count and to feed your pet properly, watch it grow up into a beautiful responsible adult! Try to get all of the different adult pet versions! (Adults stop evolving everyday)

Made in 48 hours for TOJAM (other games)

By

Michysoong

Jessica Mao

Taylor Bai-Woo

Audio By

Marius Masalar

(Which hasn't made it into it :c sorry Marius)

Bugs List!

*Only feed your pet near the top of its tank, not outside, or on top of the pet
